definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: And thank you for joining us here in the Inner Core.
Paul Raushenbush and my name is Paul Raushenbush, and this is all for now from the Inner Core.
sentences.chinese: 我是主持人，感謝您收看人性講堂。

sentences.english: And thank you for being with us here on the Inner Core.
sentences.chinese: 也感謝您來到人性講堂。

sentences.english: This has been another edition of the Inner Core.
The Athenian agora was his teaching room.
sentences.chinese: 雅典的集會所就是他的講堂。

sentences.english: The second part, the thought political lesson of the classroom teaching of rhythm control of necessity.
sentences.chinese: 第戀攬門，緬懷政治課的講堂學教節奏調控的須要性。

sentences.english: Good morning , everybody . This is the programme on the morning class.
sentences.chinese: 大家早上好，這是可可大講堂的早間節目。

sentences.english: Welcome to the 12th ICIBA online lecture live from ICIBA.com.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎光臨愛詞霸英語大講堂第十二期的訪談現場。

sentences.english: In a lecture hall of a univeristy in England sits a professor.
sentences.chinese: 在英格蘭一所大學的講堂裏坐着一位教授。

sentences.english: All information about the lectures will also be released through on-line special coverage or special editions.
sentences.chinese: 講堂內容將以網絡專題或特刊形式發佈。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal meeting room sits next to the John Pierpont Morgan lecture hall.
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵會議室的一側是約翰皮爾龐特摩根講堂。

sentences.english: When we arrived, the auditorium was already filled and so we were crowded out.
sentences.chinese: 當我們到達地，講堂已經坐滿人了，我們被擠在外邊。

sentences.english: I would delight that you are joining us today.
sentences.chinese: 很高興大家能參加我們的講堂。

sentences.english: You can take the books out of the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 您們可以或許巴麻帶出講堂。

sentences.english: And welcome to the Inner Core.
Thank you for joining us today at the Inner Core.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝大家收看我們的節目，人性講堂。
